"A Valentine's Hero!":
"The first thing I want to do to help people
enjoy Valentine's Day is check the safety
of the venue in the Volcanic Caves!
Only... my memory isn't quite all there
yet, so I don't want to go in alone.
I'm sorry to have to ask, but could you
go with me?

※Clear on Normal or higher
with Stratos (Valentines)"

"Stratos (Valentines)'s PC
※Obtained on acceptance
※No gifts given for increasing friendship level."
